metadata.title: CVE-2022-49010 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:hwmon: (coretemp) Check for null before removing sysfs attrsIf coretemp_add_core() gets an error then pdata->core_data[indx]is already NULL and has been kfreed. Don't pass that tosysfs_remove_group() as that will crash in sysfs_remove_group().[Shortened for readability][91854.020159] sysfs: cannot create duplicate filename'/devices/platform/coretemp.0/hwmon/hwmon2/temp20_label'<cpu offline>[91855.126115] BUG: kernel NULL pointer dereference, address:0000000000000188[91855.165103] #PF: supervisor read access in kernel mode[91855.194506] #PF: error_code(0x0000) - not-present page[91855.224445] PGD 0 P4D 0[91855.238508] Oops: 0000 [#1] PREEMPT SMP PTI...[91855.342716] RIP: 0010:sysfs_remove_group+0xc/0x80...[91855.796571] Call Trace:[91855.810524]  coretemp_cpu_offline+0x12b/0x1dd [coretemp][91855.841738]  ? coretemp_cpu_online+0x180/0x180 [coretemp][91855.871107]  cpuhp_invoke_callback+0x105/0x4b0[91855.893432]  cpuhp_thread_fun+0x8e/0x150...Fix this by checking for NULL first.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-49010` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.8.0-31-generic - 6.8.0-31.31
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-31-generic - 6.8.0-31.31
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-31-generic-64k - 6.8.0-31.31
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1008-aws - 6.8.0-1008.8
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1007-azure - 6.8.0-1007.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1007-gcp - 6.8.0-1007.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-31-lowlatency - 6.8.0-31.31.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-31-lowlatency-64k - 6.8.0-31.31.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1005-oracle - 6.8.0-1005.5
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1005-oracle-64k - 6.8.0-1005.5
No subscription required

linux-image-6.8.0-1004-raspi - 6.8.0-1004.4
No subscription required
